chapters.title: The Aspiring Archer
chapters.description: Ekalavya, a tribal prince, yearns to learn archery and approaches Guru Dronacharya.

chapters.title: Denied Apprenticeship
chapters.description: Dronacharya refuses to teach Ekalavya due to his allegiance to the royal Kuru princes.

chapters.title: Self-Taught Mastery
chapters.description: Ekalavya creates a statue of Dronacharya and practices diligently, becoming an exceptional archer.

chapters.title: The Ultimate Sacrifice
chapters.description: Ekalavya offers his thumb as Guru Dakshina when Dronacharya demands it, displaying unparalleled devotion.
